description: Genjo Sanzo appears in India, where he drains half the ocean to reveal a submerged fortress. He wields an extensible staff and can fly by floating on clouds. During the showdown, he manages to severely wound Nancy, but is defeated when an enraged Yomiko hurls thousands of index cards at him. He survives long enough to give Yomiko`s book to Jean-Henri Fabre, but is then killed by Ikkyu Soujun.
name: Genjou Sanzou
